item.title: 博阿兹-温斯坦称拜登比特朗普更适合债券市场
item.description: 萨巴资本管理公司（Saba Capital Management）的博阿兹-温斯坦（Boaz Weinstein）在周二举行的彭博投资会议上表示，乔-拜登总统的连任比唐纳德-特朗普再次当选总统更有利于美国债券市场。【原文：President Joe Biden’s re-election would be better for the US bond market than a second Donald Trump presidency, Saba Capital Management’s Boaz Weinstein said during the Bloomberg Invest conference on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴克莱称：美联储结束资产负债表缩减，资金市场将保持宽松
item.description: 据巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）称，美国资金市场将在今年晚些时候承受住美联储资产负债表放松计划的结束，而不会出现任何重大的焦虑迹象。【原文：US funding markets are set to withstand the end of the Federal Reserve’s balance-sheet unwind later this year without any major signs of angst, according to Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 药物试验软件制造商克拉里奥秘密申请上市
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，帮助制药商通过临床试验推进治疗的软件供应商 Clario 已秘密申请首次公开募股，目标估值超过 100 亿美元。【原文：Clario, a provider of software to help drugmakers advance treatments through clinical trials, has filed confidentially for an initial public offering and is targeting a valuation of more than $10 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 国债基准交易继续流行— 除非波动性爆发
item.description: 基差交易，一种对冲基金用来从国债及其期货合约之间微小的价格差异中获利的策略，又回来了。除非流动性紧缩扰乱这些市场，否则这种交易可能会越来越受欢迎。【原文：The basis trade, a strategy hedge funds use to profit from small price discrepancies between Treasury bonds and their futures contracts, is back. And its popularity may grow unless a liquidity squeeze disrupts those markets.】

item.title: 阿波罗的齐托称银行风险交易是 "当下最热门的投资项目
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司 (Apollo Global Management Inc.) 信贷部门副首席投资官约翰-齐托 (John Zito) 说，为银行资产负债表风险投保是 "当下最热门的投资"，该公司对这种投资一直是有选择性的。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc.’s John Zito, deputy chief investment officer for its credit arm, said insuring bank balance sheet risk is the “investment du jour” — and one that the firm has been selective about.】

item.title: 秘鲁解决中国港口争端，总统准备会见习近平
item.description: 在本周两国总统会晤之前，秘鲁和一家中国国有企业解决了关于一个价值 13 亿美元的大型港口商业模式的争议。【原文：Peru and a Chinese state-owned company resolved a dispute over the business model of a massive $1.3 billion port ahead of a meeting between the presidents of both countries this week.】

item.title: 谢因鲍姆缓慢推出内阁人选以安抚市场
item.description: 墨西哥当选总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）在投资者心目中的开局并不顺利。在她的政党取得压倒性胜利后，她越是大谈特谈改革司法系统和法官民选的计划，投资者就越是抛售墨西哥资产。比索是过去一个月全球表现最差的货币，暴跌了 8%。【原文：Claudia Sheinbaum, Mexico’s president-elect, has gotten off to a rocky start with investors. The more she’s talked — laying out plans to overhaul the judicial system and have judges be elected by popular vote — in the wake of her party’s landslide victory, the more investors have dumped Mexican assets. The peso is the worst-performing currency in the world over the past month, having plunged 8%.】

item.title: 能源投资者金默里奇控制英联邦液化天然气公司
item.description: 以能源为重点的私募股权公司基默里奇（Kimmeridge）将获得拟议中的英联邦液化天然气项目的多数股权，并任命英国石油公司（BP Plc）的一位前高管领导该企业，这标志着该公司对燃料未来的一次重大押注。【原文：Energy-focused private equity firm Kimmeridge is taking a majority ownership stake in the proposed Commonwealth LNG project and naming a former BP Plc executive to lead the venture, marking a major bet on the future of the fuel.】

item.title: Albemarle 表示，锂的低价无法支撑新工厂的支出
item.description: Albemarle 公司的一位高层管理人员表示，锂的低价并不能证明有理由对电池金属工厂进行新的投资。【原文：Lithium’s low price doesn’t justify new investments in plants for the battery metal, says a top Albemarle Corp. executive.】

item.title: CPI数据火热，交易员减少降息押注，加拿大债券下跌
item.description: 加拿大 5 月份的通胀数据高于预期，促使交易商回调了对加拿大央行 7 月份降息的押注，此后加拿大债券遭到抛售。【原文：Canadian bonds sold off after a hotter-than-expected inflation reading for May prompted traders to dial back wagers on the Bank of Canada cutting interest rates in July.】

item.title: 新兴市场债务销售在 2024 年最繁忙的一天堆积如山
item.description: 本周二，发展中国家政府纷纷进入债券市场，这将是今年此类债券销售最繁忙的一天，因为发行者将利用较低的收益率。【原文：Developing-nation governments are jumping into the bond market Tuesday in what’s poised to be one of the busiest days for sales of such debt this year, as issuers take advantage of lower yields.】

item.title: TCW 的科赫认为私人信贷违约率上升但不存在泡沫
item.description: TCW Group Inc.首席执行官凯蒂-科赫（Katie Koch）表示，她预计价值 1.7 万亿美元的私人信贷市场违约率将上升，但她并不认为会出现泡沫，因为投资者仍愿意用流动性来换取收益。【原文：TCW Group Inc. Chief Executive Officer Katie Koch said she expects higher defaults in the $1.7 trillion private credit market, but that she doesn’t see a bubble as investors are still willing to trade liquidity for yield.】

item.title: FTX 客户将投票决定数十亿美元的还款计划
item.description: 未来几周，FTX 的客户将被要求就这家倒闭的加密货币交易所数十亿美元的赔偿计划进行投票，以赔偿自其倒闭以来资产被锁定在平台上的受害者。【原文：FTX customers will be asked in the coming weeks to vote on the failed crypto exchange’s multi billion dollar plan for compensating victims whose assets have been locked on the platform since it collapsed.】

item.title: 拉丰认为人工大脑和机器人是人工智能的下一步
item.description: Coatue Management 公司创始人菲利普-拉丰（Philippe Laffont）说，由人工大脑驱动的机器人将是人工智能的下一个重大进步。【原文：Coatue Management founder Philippe Laffont said robots powered by artificial brains will be a next big step for AI.】

item.title: 新西兰发行 9 亿美元股票资助肥胖症新药研发
item.description: Zealand Pharma A/S 将出售约 63 亿丹麦克朗（约合 9 亿美元）的新股，为其肥胖症实验药物的开发提供资金，这家丹麦生物技术公司将在这一日益增长的市场上向诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S ）发起挑战。【原文：Zealand Pharma A/S is selling about 6.3 billion Danish kroner ($900 million) in new shares to fund development of its experimental obesity drugs, as the Danish biotech challenges Novo Nordisk A/S in the growing market.】

item.title: 路威酩轩集团收购瑞士高端钟表制造商 L'Epée 1839
item.description: L'Epée 1839 是瑞士的一家高端钟表制造商，这个小众计时市场在很大程度上被奢侈品集团和购物者所忽略。【原文：LVMH is buying the owner of L’Epée 1839, a Swiss manufacturer of high-end clocks, a niche timekeeping market that’s largely been bypassed by luxury conglomerates and shoppers.】

item.title: Glen Point 的尼尔-菲利普斯（Neil Phillips）因操纵外汇交易而免于美国监狱之灾
item.description: Glen Point Capital 的联合创始人尼尔-菲利普斯（Neil Phillips）因操纵汇率以触发 2000 万美元的障碍期权而避免了美国的监禁判决。【原文：Glen Point Capital co-founder Neil Phillips avoided a US prison sentence for manipulating an exchange rate in order to trigger a $20 million barrier option.】

item.title: 埃克森公司计划在圭亚那新建石油项目，将产量提高到 2030 年代
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.）向其在圭亚那的第七个石油项目迈出了第一步，这是该超级巨头打算在未来十年扩大南美国家原油产量的明确信号。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. took the first step toward what will be its seventh oil project in Guyana, a clear signal the supermajor intends to expand crude output from the South American nation into the next decade.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉债权人为债务重组聘请新法律顾问
item.description: 一批委内瑞拉债券持有人聘请 Orrick, Herrington & Sutcliffe LLP 律师事务所作为其新的法律顾问，为最终与政府谈判大规模债务重组做准备。【原文：A group of Venezuela bondholders hired Orrick, Herrington & Sutcliffe LLP as its new legal adviser as they gear up to eventually negotiate a massive debt restructuring with the government.】

item.title: 摩根大通称国债流动性好于交易员预期
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co：别担心，全球最大债券市场的流动性正在恢复。【原文：For investors watching US Treasuries for signs of renewed turmoil, JPMorgan Chase & Co. has some advice: Don’t worry, liquidity in the world’s biggest bond market is on the mend.】

item.title: 阿达尼集团斥资 156 亿美元推进绿色和基础设施建设
item.description: 阿达尼集团今年将把资本支出增加一倍，加快对绿色能源和基础设施项目（包括港口、机场和公路）的投资，这再次表明该企业集团已经摆脱了一份具有破坏性的卖空报告所带来的影响。【原文：Adani Group will double capital spending this year, accelerating investments in green energy and infrastructure projects, including ports, airports and roads, in yet another sign that the conglomerate has put the fallout from a damaging shortseller report behind it.】

item.title: 如果罢工继续，埃克森可能不得不关闭法国炼油厂
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. said it may have to halt its Gravenchon refinery in northern France if strike action continues.】

item.title: 埃克森签署向韩国电池巨头供应锂的协议
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）签署了一项初步协议，将向韩国电池制造商 SK On Co. 公司供应其在阿肯色州开发的矿床所产的锂，从而加深了这家石油巨头与快速发展的电动汽车行业的联系。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. signed a preliminary agreement to supply South Korean battery-maker SK On Co. with lithium from a deposit it’s developing in Arkansas, deepening the oil major’s connections to the rapidly growing electric-vehicle industry.】

item.title: 亿万富翁威斯的 Brait 计划在三年内结束投资组合
item.description: Brait SE 是一家南非投资控股公司，由亿万富翁克里斯托-维斯（Christo Wiese）支持，预计将在未来 18 个月至三年内出售其现有投资组合，并将资金返还给投资者。【原文：Brait SE, a South African investment holding company backed by billionaire Christo Wiese, expects to sell its current portfolio in the next 18 months to three years and return money to investors.】

item.title: 德国银行首次跌出顶级外债交易商排行榜
item.description: 由于华尔街的竞争对手主导着欧洲最重要的债券市场，有史以来第一次没有德国银行成为国债拍卖的最大买家。【原文：There are no German banks among the top buyers at the nation’s debt auctions for the first time on record, as their Wall Street rivals dominate Europe’s premier bond market.】

item.title: 史蒂夫-艾斯曼称 Nvidia 的故事将持续多年
item.description: 对 Neuberger Berman Group 的 Steve Eisman 来说，过去三个交易日人工智能宠儿英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：A $430 billion sell-off over the past three trading days in artificial intelligence darling Nvidia Corp. is no more than a blip to Neuberger Berman Group’s Steve Eisman.】

item.title: 麦吉尼斯警告：欧盟国家面临破坏银行业联盟推进工作的风险
item.description: 一位高级官员周二警告说，欧盟推动银行一体化的努力有可能被各国政府相互冲突的计划所淹没，从而降低银行联盟的吸引力。【原文：A European Union push to integrate its banks is at risk of being subsumed by conflicting plans by national governments that would make a banking union less attractive, a senior official warned Tuesday.】

item.title: 纽约 MTA 将详细介绍暂停收费如何挤压运营预算
item.description: 纽约市交通局警告说，在州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）暂停将数十亿资金投入交通基础设施的拥堵收费计划后，其运营预算将面临财务压力。【原文：New York City’s transit agency is warning of financial pressures to its operating budget after Governor Kathy Hochul’s paused a congestion pricing plan that would have directed billions to transit infrastructure.】

item.title: 信息技术故障导致德国电价飙升至 22 个月新高
item.description: 周二，欧洲最大电力交易所的信息技术故障导致德国电力价格飙升至 2022 年 8 月以来的最高点。【原文：An IT glitch on Europe’s biggest power exchange caused the German power price to jump to the highest since August 2022 on Tuesday.】
